meanings.definition: A small wheel or disk on a machine or device that can be turned with the thumb to adjust settings or move something.
meanings.sent1: I used the thumbwheel to adjust the volume on the radio.
meanings.sent2: She quickly turned the thumbwheel to increase the brightness of the screen.
meanings.sent3: The thumbwheel on the oven was stuck, making it impossible to set the timer.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a thumbwheel, constantly adjusting to new information.
meanings.sent5: The thumbwheel clicked softly as it was turned, changing the temperature setting.

meanings.definition: A control knob that is operated by the thumb.
meanings.sent1: The thumbwheel on the gaming controller made it easier to navigate.
meanings.sent2: He adjusted the temperature using the thumbwheel on the air conditioner.
meanings.sent3: She pretended the thumbwheel was a spaceship control in her imaginary game.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like a thumbwheel, always ready to make small adjustments.
meanings.sent5: The thumbwheel felt smooth under his thumb, giving precise control over the settings.
